column4: Is there a way to clone an SD Card with dd but in a way that the output of the device is half the size of the actual card? For example my SD card is 512 MB but the content on there only actually fills 128MB, is there a way to clone the partitions but with a smaller cylinder size?
Is there any reason a simple copy of the files on it wouldn't serve your purposes?
Yes - I'm making an image which is going to be written to a card to be booted on an ARM device
I see.  You're probably best off doing as Dr_Willis suggests, then.
